## ChampionMasteryManager class

A champion mastery manager - to fetch and manage all summoner's champion mastery data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ChampionMasteryManager implements BaseManager<ChampionMastery> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;[ChampionMastery](./shieldbow.championmastery.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, summoner)](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ChampionMasteryManager</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager.cache.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, [ChampionMastery](./shieldbow.championmastery.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The cached mastery data for the summoner. |
|  [client](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager.client.md) |  | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client this manager belongs to. |
|  [sortedCache](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager.sortedcache.md) |  | [ChampionMastery](./shieldbow.championmastery.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The cached champion masteries of the summoner as a sorted array.<!-- -->The array is sorted from the highest mastery to lowest. While sorting, the mastery level is prioritized over the number of points. |
|  [summonerId](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager.summonerid.md) |  | string | The ID of the summoner whose mastery is managed by this manager. |
|  [totalScore](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager.totalscore.md) |  | number | The total mastery score of this summoner. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fetch(champion, options)](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager.fetch.md) |  | Fetch a champion's mastery data for the summoner. |
|  [highest(n)](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager.highest.md) |  | Get the nth highest champion mastery for the summoner. |
|  [refreshAll()](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager.refreshall.md) |  | Update the cache with the latest data for all champions' mastery data for this summoner. |
|  [updateTotalScore()](./shieldbow.championmasterymanager.updatetotalscore.md) |  | Get an updated total mastery score for this summoner. |
